Package control

Class AppointmentForm

java.lang.Object
control.Controller
control.AppointmentForm
public class AppointmentForm
extends Controller
The AppointmentForm extends Controller and controls the appointment form, which allows for the creation and modification of appointments.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected static Appointment appointment
    The static appointment member is used to load an existing appointment into the form.

    Fields inherited from class control.Controller

    APPOINTMENT_FORM_FXML, CUSTOMER_FORM_FXML, CUSTOMERS_FXML, dao, LOGIN_FXML, MENU_FXML, REPORT_FXML, SCHEDULE_FXML, TIME_FORMAT

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    AppointmentForm()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void add​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    The add method inserts a new appointment into the data layer, using then data in the appointment form fields.
    void cancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    The cancel method closes the appointment form without performing any data operations.
    void initialize()
    The initialize method is ran when the controller object is created, it executes the initial setup of the form, and loads the data from the appointment if one was provided.
    void update​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    The update method updates an appointment in the data layer, using then data in the appointment form fields.

    Methods inherited from class control.Controller

    changeScene, close, confirm, error, formatTime, messageBox, messageBox, popupScene

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
